T02D2630:112b-1: sarba durga ti pa ri sho dha ni ma h'a
T02D2630:112b-2: manda la s'a dha no pi ka / bod skad
T02D2630:112b-3: du / ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2630:112b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo ;
T02D2630:112b-5: / lha tshogs dga' tshal rab tu yid 'ong nor bu gser shing yal ga sogs //
T02D2630:112b-6: sman dang me tog bya mang skad 'byin tshangs pa la sogs 'khor gyis bskor //
T02D2630:112b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang lhan cig bzhugs pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2630:112b-8: ngan song rnam par spyong bar byed pa la sogs rtsa ba'i rgyud chen las //
T02D2630:112b-9: bsdus te bla ma'i man ngag rim pa'i gzhung de ding 'dir bdag gis ni //
T02D2630:112b-10: mos dang goms pa'i dbang gis bsgrub pa'i rim pa de las mi 'gal ba //
T02D2630:112b-11: mun pa'i sgron ma bzhin du gsal bar 'gro ba kun la phan phyir bshad //
T02D2630:112b-12: nyams dga' ba'am gtsug lag khang //
T02D2630:112b-13: skyed tshal mchod rten lha khang sogs //
T02D2630:112b-14: de lta bu yi ga nas dag tu //
T02D2630:112b-16: rnam par dag par mos pa ni //
T02D2630:112b-17: de yis nang gi khrus bya'o //
T02D2630:112b-18: spos dang ga bur gur kum gyis //
T02D2630:112b-19: bkru ba phyi yi khrus su gsungs //
T02D2630:112b-20: dang por sngags pa bdag gis dag / dag par 'dod pas 'di ltar bsam //
T02D2630:112b-21: mgrin pa'i bu gu stong pa la //
T02D2630:112b-22: yi ge hr'i: las padma bsam //
T02D2630:112b-23: lce la pam las bskyed pa yi /
T02D2630:112b-25: de steng yi ge aa las ni //
T02D2630:112b-26: bskyed pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02D2630:112b-27: h'um gis rdo rje rtse lnga bskyed //
T02D2630:112b-28: rdo rje lce la thim byas nas //
T02D2630:112b-29: rdo rje lce zhes bya ba ste //
T02D2630:112b-30: sngags bzlas mthu dang ldan par 'gyur //
T02D2630:112b-31: lag gnyis mdun du bzhag byas la //
T02D2630:112b-32: de gnyis dkyil du zla dkyil bsam //
T02D2630:112b-33: de steng yi ge h'um las ni //
T02D2630:112b-34: rdo rje rtse lnga bskyed byas te //
T02D2630:112b-35: shin tu mdog dkar de lag nang //
T02D2630:112b-36: thim pa rdo rje lag par bshad //
T02D2630:112b-37: lag pa'i rdo rje thim byas nas //
T02D2630:112b-38: phyag rgya gang yin bcing bar bya //
T02D2630:112b-39: de nas rdo rje 'jigs byed nas //
T02D2630:112b-40: rdo rje ri yi mthar thug par //
T02D2630:112b-41: phyogs dang dra ba ra ba dang //
T02D2630:112b-42: bsrung ba'i 'khor lo thams cad kyang //
T02D2630:112b-43: mkhas par gyur pas rab tu bsgom //
T02D2630:113a-2: thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis //
T02D2630:113a-3: rdo rje dril bu g-yon phyogs nas //
T02D2630:113a-4: blangs la lag pa'i steng bzhag ste //
T02D2630:113a-5: rdo rje snying rje byang chub ste //
T02D2630:113a-6: dril bu stong pa'i bdag tu brtag / de ltar bdag gis bsam byas la //
T02D2630:113a-7: spyi bor dkrol te dbang bskur ro //
T02D2630:113a-8: de nas phab la lan gsum dkrol //
T02D2630:113a-9: de gnyis gcig gis gcig 'khyud de //
T02D2630:113a-10: rdo rje lan gsum gsor byas la //
T02D2630:113a-11: thugs kar brtan pa spyan drangs pa //
T02D2630:113a-12: dril bu'i sgras ni dgyes pa ste //
T02D2630:113a-13: de ltar bsams na nus pa skye //
T02D2630:113a-14: de nas 'gro la phan don du //
T02D2630:113a-15: mchog gi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D2630:113a-16: dang por 'khor lo bzhag byas te //
T02D2630:113a-17: mkha' la dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
T02D2630:113a-18: de ltar byas 'og phyag lnga bya //
T02D2630:113a-19: spos dang me tog mar me dang //
T02D2630:113a-20: dri dang lha bshos rnam ldas mchod //
T02D2630:113a-21: sdig pa bshags dang rjes yi rang //
T02D2630:113a-22: gsol ba gdab dang skyabs su 'gro //
T02D2630:113a-23: bskyed dang bskul dang lam bsgom dang //
T02D2630:113a-24: dkyil 'khor de la bdag gis kyang //
T02D2630:113a-25: sdom pa thams cad gzung bar bya //
T02D2630:113a-26: de 'og spos la sogs pa dang //
T02D2630:113a-27: sgeg mol sogs brgyad kyis mchod //
T02D2630:113a-28: rgyud chen nang nas gsungs pa yi //
T02D2630:113a-29: bcu phrag gnyis kyi mchod pas mchod //
T02D2630:113a-30: gzhan yang lha klu la sogs kyis //
T02D2630:113a-31: bsti stang bla ma mchod cing brjod //
T02D2630:113a-32: mchod pa'i sprin gyis rab mchod nas //
T02D2630:113a-33: sangs rgyas la ni yon tan brjod //
T02D2630:113a-34: kye ma'o sangs rgyas kye sangs rgyas //
T02D2630:113a-35: kye ma'o sangs rgyas mdzad pa legs //
T02D2630:113a-36: gang phyir ngan song bdag sbyangs nas //
T02D2630:113a-37: byang chub spyod pa nyid la bkod //
T02D2630:113a-38: de nas dbang por bcas pa'i lha //
T02D2630:113a-39: thams cad thal mo spyar byas nas //
T02D2630:113a-40: ngo mtshar skyes nas phyag 'tshal te //
T02D2630:113a-41: de yi mod la mi snang gyur //
T02D2630:113a-43: go rims bzhin du bsgom par bya //
T02D2630:113a-44: bdag gi snying ga'i dbus su ni //
T02D2630:113a-45: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
T02D2630:113a-46: de yi dbus su dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D2630:113a-47: nam mkhar bsgom pa bsdus nas su //
T02D2630:113a-48: snying ga'i dkyil du gzhag par bya //
T02D2630:113a-49: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs kyis //
T02D2630:113a-50: dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang //
T02D2630:113a-51: dbang du bya ba rnam pa bzhis //
T02D2630:113a-52: rnam pa gnyis po bsdus nas ni //
T02D2630:113b-0: dkyil 'khor gcig tu @113b bdag gis bsgom //
T02D2630:113b-2: rdzogs pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba'i //
T02D2630:113b-3: sbyong ba'i rgyal po la sogs pa'i //
T02D2630:113b-4: dkyil 'khor lha ni thams cad dag / bdag gi snying ga'i dbus su ni //
T02D2630:113b-5: btso bo'i rgyal po bsgom par bya //
T02D2630:113b-6: de nas rgyal ba'i thugs ka ru //
T02D2630:113b-7: zla dkyil dbus su sngags kyi gzugs //
T02D2630:113b-9: gdug pa gang yin thams cad la //
T02D2630:113b-10: phog pas de dag kun bkug nas //
T02D2630:113b-11: sngags dang phyag rgyas de dag dbrog / de sogs thabs kyi thabs kyis ni //
T02D2630:113b-12: khams gsum sdug bsngal spyang bar bya //
T02D2630:113b-13: de las grol zhing thar byas nas //
T02D2630:113b-14: 'od zer gyis kyang phog byas nas //
T02D2630:113b-15: snying gar dgug gzhug byas nas ni //
T02D2630:113b-16: rim pas dbang bskur spyin par bya //
T02D2630:113b-17: de ltar dbang bskur ba tsam gyis //
T02D2630:113b-18: srid gsum sems can ma lus kyang //
T02D2630:113b-19: rgyal sras kun dang mnyam mthong nas //
T02D2630:113b-20: drin lan tshul du mchod par bya'o ;
T02D2630:113b-21: / chos dbyings ye shes rnam par dag / rnam par snang mdzad bcom ldan 'das //
T02D2630:113b-22: ting nge 'dzin ldan phyag rgya can //
T02D2630:113b-23: phyag 'tshal rdo rje kun rig la'o //
T02D2630:113b-24: me long ye shes rang bzhin las //
T02D2630:113b-25: sems can ma lus thams cad kyi //
T02D2630:113b-26: ngan song thams cad sbyong mdzad pa //
T02D2630:113b-27: phyag 'tshal spyod pa'i rgyal po la'o //
T02D2630:113b-28: mnyam nyid ye shes yon tan bdag / yid bzhin nor bu rin chen gyis //
T02D2630:113b-29: sems can bsam pa skong mdzad pa //
T02D2630:113b-30: rgyal mchog rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02D2630:113b-31: so sor kun rtog gsung gi bdag / gsung rab padma kha rgyas pas //
T02D2630:113b-32: khams gsum dbugs 'byin rab mdzad pa //
T02D2630:113b-34: nan tan ye shes phrin las bdag / sna tshogs sems can sdug bsngal kun //
T02D2630:113b-35: ma lus par ni zhi bar mdzad //
T02D2630:113b-36: me tog kun rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02D2630:113b-37: grva yi phyogs ni kun du yang //
T02D2630:113b-38: rigs kyi yum gyi skur bstan pa //
T02D2630:113b-39: lha mo spyan dang m'a ma k'i / dkar mo sgrol ma khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02D2630:113b-40: rtsibs kyi nang ni thams cad na //
T02D2630:113b-41: bzhugs pa'i rdo rje sems la sogs //
T02D2630:113b-42: rdzu 'phrul che ba'i sems dpa' rnams //
T02D2630:113b-43: 'bras bur ldan la rgyud bzhin bstod //
T02D2630:113b-44: sgeg mo phreng dang glu dang gar //
T02D2630:113b-45: spos dang me tog mar me dang //
T02D2630:114a-2: phyi nang lha mo phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2630:114a-3: sgo yi khyams kyi nang bzhugs pa //
T02D2630:114a-4: byams pa la sogs bcu drug kyang //
T02D2630:114a-5: dang po dga' sogs sa gnas shing //
T02D2630:114a-6: 'gro ba'i don la rtag gnas pa //
T02D2630:114a-7: sems can kun byams rang bzhin can //
T02D2630:114a-8: snying rje blo mkhyen 'jam pa'i dpal //
T02D2630:114a-9: shes rab blo chen spos glang po //
T02D2630:114a-10: nyon mongs 'joms pa'i ye shes tog / rdzu 'phrul stobs dang ldan bzang skyong //
T02D2630:114a-11: shugs kyis kun skyong don yod mthong //
T02D2630:114a-12: tshogs gnyis yongs bsags blo mi zad //
T02D2630:114a-13: stobs bcus yongs gnon spobs pa brtsegs //
T02D2630:114a-14: mi shes ri 'joms mthu chen thob //
T02D2630:114a-16: nyon mongs mun sel mya ngan 'joms //
T02D2630:114a-17: lha yi gzugs 'joms dra ba can //
T02D2630:114a-18: lus ngag spyod dag zla ba'i 'od //
T02D2630:114a-19: bsam pa mngon rtogs bdud rtsi 'od //
T02D2630:114a-20: nam mkha'i nor 'chang nam mkha'i mdzod //
T02D2630:114a-21: 'jig rten kun phan kun du bzang //
T02D2630:114a-22: rnam thar bzhi ldan sems dpa'i gtso //
T02D2630:114a-23: sa gnas rnams la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2630:114a-24: tva ra na yi khyams bar na //
T02D2630:114a-25: dpe bral sems dpa' bcu drug ni //
T02D2630:114a-26: sa dang pha rol phyin grub pa //
T02D2630:114a-27: rigs kyi dbang gis bzhugs pa ni //
T02D2630:114a-29: mi shes gsal byed mun pa sel //
T02D2630:114a-31: nyon mongs 'joms pa srid mtsho sgrol //
T02D2630:114a-32: thugs kyi rang bzhin rdo rje dkar //
T02D2630:114a-33: sems dpa'i gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2630:114a-34: dgos 'dod skong ba rin chen mdzod //
T02D2630:114a-35: dam chos 'phel mdzad dge blo gros //
T02D2630:114a-36: chos smra don mthun yid du 'ong //
T02D2630:114a-37: rgyu 'bras kun dran dran stobs mchog / yon tan rang bzhin rin chen bsngo //
T02D2630:114a-38: de skong tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2630:114a-40: snod bcud 'bras ston legs pa'i tog / khams gsum thams cad srid mtsho sgrol //
T02D2630:114a-42: gsung gi rang bzhin padma dmar //
T02D2630:114a-43: gsung rab kha 'byed rnams la bstod //
T02D2630:114a-44: yid myur brtson 'grus mi ldog pa //
T02D2630:114a-45: bskrun med tshad med yon tan mdzod //
T02D2630:114a-46: mu stegs rgol 'joms the tshom myur //
T02D2630:114b-0: rgyu 'bras shes smra nga ro @114b snyan ;
T02D2630:114b-1: / phrin las rang bzhin rgya gram ljang //
T02D2630:114b-2: don mdzad rigs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2630:114b-3: rab tu byung nas tshul khrims sdom //
T02D2630:114b-4: ston pa'i rtags 'chang nyan thos mchog / phyag na po ti par sreg shang //
T02D2630:114b-5: sku mdog ma des tha dad pa //
T02D2630:114b-6: nyid gcud tshe ldan dga' bo dang //
T02D2630:114b-7: sku yi sras gyur sgra gcan zin //
T02D2630:114b-8: shes rab mchog gyur sh'a ri'i bu //
T02D2630:114b-10: rdzu 'phrul che ba mood gal bu //
T02D2630:114b-11: khyim pa dad skyed 'char ka bzang //
T02D2630:114b-13: dam chos thos mnga' koonda n+yi //
T02D2630:114b-15: spyod mdzes bdud 'dul rta thul ba //
T02D2630:114b-16: ting 'dzin dbang thob ba lang bdag / zhabs 'bring rtag mdzad kun dga' bo //
T02D2630:114b-19: sbyangs pa'i yon tan ldan gang po //
T02D2630:114b-20: zhal ta'i sku bgres pa 'od srungs //
T02D2630:114b-21: bslab sbyangs yon tan kun ldan pa ;
T02D2630:114b-22: / nyan thos rnams la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2630:114b-23: rten 'brel don la brten gnas pas //
T02D2630:114b-24: 'phags pa rang rgyal bcu gnyis la //
T02D2630:114b-25: nyon mongs 'joms byed gdung ba sel //
T02D2630:114b-26: ting 'dzin gsal ba snang ba brtsegs //
T02D2630:114b-29: shes pa'i rtsal ldan shes rab mgyogs //
T02D2630:114b-30: 'khor rlung mi bskyod ri bo rgyal //
T02D2630:114b-31: gsung gi sgra dang ldan sgra chen //
T02D2630:114b-32: dmigs pa rtse gcig bse ru ba //
T02D2630:114b-35: 'jigs pa kun bral seng ge'i sgra //
T02D2630:114b-36: ting 'dzin gsal byed yid myur ba //
T02D2630:114b-37: 'byung dang bzlog la rab zhugs pa //
T02D2630:114b-38: rang rgyal gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2630:114b-39: phyi rol sgo yi nang gnas pa //
T02D2630:114b-40: khro bo srin po'i cha lugs can //
T02D2630:114b-41: sbrul dang mi sdug mgos brgyan pa //
T02D2630:114b-42: stag lbags [?] kyis ni smad dkris shing //
T02D2630:114b-43: khams gsum gsal byed 'jig rten snang //
T02D2630:114b-45: thugs kyi rang bzhin rdo rje dang //
T02D2630:114b-47: ma rungs sdig byed gsum 'jig pa //
T02D2630:114b-48: ma rungs 'joms byed gsum mthar byed //
T02D2630:114b-49: yon tan rang byung rtse gsum dang //
T02D2630:115a-2: dgos pa sgrub mdzad bdud rtsi 'khyil //
T02D2630:115a-3: srid pa 'joms mdzad be con sngo //
T02D2630:115a-4: gsung gi rang bzhin rgya gram dang //
T02D2630:115a-6: nyon mongs g-yo med mi g-yo mgon //
T02D2630:115a-7: dbang gi rang bzhin rta mgrin rgyal //
T02D2630:115a-8: phrin las rang bzhin ral gri dang //
T02D2630:115a-10: phyi yi dkyil 'khor phyi rol du //
T02D2630:115a-11: mu ran dkar po'i nang gnas pa //
T02D2630:115a-12: gling bzhi po ni bri bar bya //
T02D2630:115a-13: shar phyogs lus 'phags zla gam na //
T02D2630:115a-14: lha yi dbang po brgya byin ni //
T02D2630:115a-15: mchan na bde sogs la sogs pa'i //
T02D2630:115a-17: lho phyogs 'dzam gling sog ka na //
T02D2630:115a-18: 'jig rten mes po tshangs pa dang //
T02D2630:115a-19: btsun mo tshangs ma pho nya mngag / yid 'ong bcas la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2630:115a-20: nub phyogs glang spyod zlum po na //
T02D2630:115a-21: lha chen dbang phyug chen po dang //
T02D2630:115a-22: mchan na dka' zlog la sogs pa'i //
T02D2630:115a-24: byang phyogs che rgyas gru bzhin //
T02D2630:115a-26: mchan na dpal ldan la sogs pa'i //
T02D2630:115a-28: khor yug nyid la gnas pa yi //
T02D2630:115a-29: 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po la //
T02D2630:115a-30: 'khor dang bcas la bstod pa ni //
T02D2630:115a-31: mche ba drug pa mdog dkar ba'i //
T02D2630:115a-32: glang chen de ni brgya byin gdan //
T02D2630:115a-34: mchan na sha tsi au pa si //
T02D2630:115a-35: dbang phyug chen po bishnu dang //
T02D2630:115a-36: bhri dgi ri ti dga' byed dang //
T02D2630:115a-37: gzhon nu smin drug tshogs kyi bdag / stobs bzang legs ldan la sogs bstod //
T02D2630:115a-38: lho phyogs gshin rje'i rgyal po ni //
T02D2630:115a-39: ma he'i gdan can g-yon dkur brten //
T02D2630:115a-40: mchan na nag mo 'chi bdag mo //
T02D2630:115a-41: be con g-yas na 'dzin pa ste //
T02D2630:115a-42: rdo rje gzhon nu ma dang ni //
T02D2630:115a-43: nam gru ma dang nag mo dang //
T02D2630:115a-44: rdo rje lu gu rgyud sogs bstod //
T02D2630:115a-45: nub phyogs ngos kyi chu lha ni //
T02D2630:115a-46: lus mdog dkar zhing ser ba dang //
T02D2630:115a-47: sbrul gyis lus brgyan chu srin gdan //
T02D2630:115a-48: zhags pa rin chen bsnams pa ste //
T02D2630:115a-49: mtha' yas dang ni 'jog po dang //
T02D2630:115a-50: karko ta dang ku li ka / nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong dang //
T02D2630:115b-0: padma chu bdag la @115b sogs bstod //
T02D2630:115b-1: byang phyogs gnod sbyin rgyal po ni //
T02D2630:115b-2: gser gyi mdog 'dra rin chen dang //
T02D2630:115b-3: g-yon pa snye ma rta yi gdan //
T02D2630:115b-4: mchan na chung mar bcas pa ste //
T02D2630:115b-5: yang dag shes dang 'brog gnas dang //
T02D2630:115b-6: nor bu bzang po dzambha la //
T02D2630:115b-7: gang ba bzang po ku be ra //
T02D2630:115b-8: panytsi ka dang nor lha'i rgyal //
T02D2630:115b-10: me gzugs kha dog drug ldan pa'i //
T02D2630:115b-11: dkyil na chung ma dang bcas pa //
T02D2630:115b-12: lus dmar ba la ra skyes gdan //
T02D2630:115b-14: me bzhi dang ni nag pa dang //
T02D2630:115b-15: yang dag shes dang mdun bdar dang //
T02D2630:115b-16: gya gyur 'gyur med aa gur dang //
T02D2630:115b-18: lho nub mtshams kyi bden bral ni //
T02D2630:115b-19: yi drags gdan can dmar nag mdog / me 'bar ba ni g-yon na 'dzin //
T02D2630:115b-20: g-yas pa ral gri 'dzin pa ste //
T02D2630:115b-21: lang ka mgrin bcu me stag dang //
T02D2630:115b-23: 'jigs shing gsod byed la sogs bstod //
T02D2630:115b-24: nub byang rlung lha'i rgyal po ni //
T02D2630:115b-25: nam mkha'i mdog can sha ba'i gdan //
T02D2630:115b-26: ba dan gyen du bsgred [*bsgreng?] ba 'dzin //
T02D2630:115b-27: g-yon pa rlung sgye'u thogs pa ste //
T02D2630:115b-28: rnam par snang mdzad sgra gcan 'dzin //
T02D2630:115b-29: sum brtsegs dang ni rab sim dang //
T02D2630:115b-30: lha min he ran ke shu dang //
T02D2630:115b-31: kun du snang sogs phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2630:115b-32: byang shar 'byung bo'i bdag po ni //

T02D2630:122b-0: mchod pa @122b rnam pa sna tshogs mchod //

T02D2630:122b-3: thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro sdug sel //

T02D2630:122b-6: yon tan phra mo tshad med de //

T02D2630:122b-8: dngos grub mnyam med dpe bral ba //
T02D2630:122b-9: 'gro la nges par stsol mdzad bstod //

T02D2630:122b-14: tshad med tshad bral yongs rdzogs pa'i //

T02D2630:122b-17: bzang po shin tu mchog ldan bstod //
T02D2630:122b-18: mchog sbyin nang na mchog brnyes pas //

T02D2630:122b-29: de yis bsod nams tshogs bsgoms pa //

T02D2630:122b-32: // / de nas rdul tshon mgo rtsom ste //

T02D2630:122b-36: sa yi lha mo rnams la ni //

T02D2630:123a-2: dri zhim chu yis lus bkrus la //

T02D2630:123a-11: mtshams dang dra ba ra ba dag / bdud dang sdang ba bzlog par bya //
T02D2630:123a-12: de nas phur bu byin brlabs nas //

T02D2630:123a-23: byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags bstan pa//

T02D2630:123a-26: gdab pa'i 'gro stangs bskor ba ni //
T02D2630:123a-27: rgyud dang man ngag bzhin du bstan //
T02D2630:123a-28: byin brlabs byas pa'i gnas de ru //

T02D2630:124a-0: ji ltar me lha spyan drangs nas @124a * //

T02D2630:124a-6: dkyil 'khor lha rnams bsgom par bya //
T02D2630:124a-7: rdo rje khu tshur rab bcings te //

T02D2630:124a-9: rdo rje rab bsrungs phyag rgyas te //

T02D2630:124a-12: dza: h'um bam ho: dang ldan par //

T02D2630:124a-17: 'bras chan me tog dkar po dang //
T02D2630:124a-18: spang spos sbrang rtsi mar rnams dang //

T02D2630:124a-26: sngags ni ci nus bzlas byas nas //
T02D2630:124a-27: gang ba'i sbyin sreg dbul bar bya //
T02D2630:124a-28: sems can phan don ci 'dod bsngo //

T02D2630:124a-31: sbyin sreg chen po brtsam par bya //

T02D2630:124a-47: padma dkar po'i steng nyid du //
T02D2630:124a-48: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bri bar bya'o //

T02D2630:124b-10: se gol lan gsum gdab la gshegs //
T02D2630:124b-11: rdul tshon dkyil 'khor bsdu bya ste //

T02D2630:124b-13: lhag mchu bo chen por dor //

T02D2630:124b-15: dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa yis //

T02D2630:124b-22: sgrub pa'i thabs su gsungs pa la //
T02D2630:124b-24: de yi bka' la rab brtan brtsams //
T02D2630:124b-25: 'di yis bsod nams gang thob pa //
T02D2630:124b-27: 'phrul dga'i gnas su skyes nas su //
T02D2630:124b-28: bla med byang chub thob par shog / ngan song
T02D2630:124b-29: thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i
T02D2630:124b-30: sgrub thabs slob dpon kun dga' snying pos mdzad pa
